headline: Global Payments Announces Agreement to Divest Payroll Business
summary: ATLANTA, May 28, 2025--Global Payments announced today that it has entered into a definitive agreement to divest its Payroll business to Acrisure.

summary: Global Payments said on Wednesday it would sell its payroll business to financial technology firm Acrisure for $1.1 billion, marking the payments company's latest attempt at simplifying its business...
